# Orient store

## Orient values

| Property | default | Description |
| :------- | :------ | :---------- |
| active   | false   |             |

## Orient events

| Event name | Argument | Description                          |
| :--------- | :------- | :----------------------------------- |
| onChange   | Element  | Called when the value is changed     |
| onMount    | Element  | Called when the component is mounted |
| onClean    | null     | Called when the component is removed |

## Orient state

```ts
export interface OrientState {
        snapshot: [OrientState]
        active: boolean
        _active: boolean
        _value: Vec3
        value: Vec3
        delta: Vec3
        offset: Vec3
        movement: Vec3
        memo: any
        callback(): void
        onChange(): void
        onMount(): void
        onClean(): void
}
```
